org.terrier.utility.io
Class RandomDataInputMemory

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          java.io.DataInputStream
              org.terrier.utility.io.RandomDataInputMemory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, DataInput, Cloneable, RandomDataInput
public class RandomDataInputMemory
extends DataInputStream
implements RandomDataInput, Cloneable

Implements a RandomDataInput backed by a byte[] rather than a file.

Since:
3.0
Author:
Craig Macdonald
